dayFirstSixMonth: Day must be in 1, 31 for the first six months
daySecondSixMonth: Day must be in 1, 30 for the second six months (Exc. non-leap)
dayTwelthMonthLeap: Day must be in 1, 30 range for the 12th month of a LEAP year
dayTwelthMonthNonLeap: Day must be in 1, 29 for the 12th month of a NON-LEAP year
